mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, create_date, update_date, view, user_idx) values(#{title}, #{content}, now(), now(), 0, 1)
mapper.select: select post_idx as postIdx, title, content, view, update_date as updateDate from board
select post_idx as postIdx, title, content, view, update_date as updateDate from board where title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() where post_idx = #{postIdx}
